comment: We should do more than pray. Massive DELTA/SEAL commando raid NOW. Punto basta.

# ::snt We should do more than pray. Massive DELTA/SEAL commando raid NOW. Punto basta.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / recommend-01
            :ARG1 (d / do-02
                  :ARG0 (w / we)
                  :ARG1-of (h / have-quant-91
                        :ARG3 (m2 / more)
                        :ARG4 (p / pray-01
                              :ARG0 w))))
      :snt2 (r2 / raid-01
            :ARG0 (c / commando)
            :mod (m3 / massive)
            :mod (s / slash
                  :op1 (d2 / DELTA)
                  :op2 (c2 / country
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "SEAL")))
            :time (n2 / now))
      :snt3 (p2 / punto-basta))

# ::snt Send them one of these.
(s / send-01

      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (o / one
            :ARG1-of (ii / include-91
                  :ARG2 (t / this)))
      :ARG2 (t2 / they))

# ::snt Never Forget.
(f / forget-01
      :polarity -
      :mode imperative
      :ARG0 (y / you)
